thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com | 2 of 86
thread.title: Kim K.
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Kim K.

author: Kim K.
title: Kim K.
text: Loved all of the products!! Challenge of ordering was trying to have the package delivered to a different address than the billing address - the form had the ability to do so but refused and I tried at least 6 times. Would have liked a better tracking system, the tracking number sent was not actually a tracking number. Only because the shipment was not going where I needed it to was this a small issue.
